mapper.select: select * from member where mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pass=#{mem_pass}
mapper.insert: insert into member (mem_id, mem_pass, mem_name, mem_addr, mem_hp, mem_exit, mem_admin, mem_sit, mem_shop, mem_hair,mem_point,mem_black) values(#{mem_id},#{mem_pass},#{mem_name},#{mem_addr},#{mem_hp},1,1,1,1, 1,0,1)
mapper.update: update member set mem_pass=#{mem_pass}, mem_name=#{mem_name}, mem_addr=#{mem_addr}, mem_addr2=#{mem_addr2}, mem_hp=#{mem_hp} where mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select * from member where mem_exit = 1 and mem_id != 'admin' order by mem_id ) a ) where rnum between (${page}*${pageSize})-(${pageSize}-1) and (${page}*${pageSize})
select count(*) from member where mem_exit = 1

select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select * from member where mem_exit = 1 and mem_black = 1 and mem_id != 'admin' order by mem_id ) a ) where rnum between (${page}*${pageSize})-(${pageSize}-1) and (${page}*${pageSize})
select count(*) from member where mem_exit = 1 and mem_black = 1
